ORM

This module includes the asynchronous ORM functionalities for the SQLite3 subpackage.

class DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM.ORMManager.ORMManager(db_name: str, cache_ttl: int = 300)[source]

Bases: Manager

async apply_migrations(model: Type[Model]) → None[source]

Apply migrations to the database schema based on the provided model asynchronously.

Parameters:

model (Type[Model]) – The model class used for applying migrations.

Raises:

ORMMException – If there is an error applying migrations.

Examples

Field and Model Definition

Define fields and models using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Fetch All Rows

Fetch all rows from a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    async with ORMManager(db_name='example.db') as orm_manager:
        User.set_manager(orm_manager)
        await User.create_table()
        await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
        users = await User.fetch_all(query='SELECT * FROM user')
        print("All users:", users)

asyncio.run(main())

Create Table

Create a table using the ORM functionalities.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Insert Row

Insert a row into a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Select Rows

Select rows from a table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
    users = await User.select()
    print("Users:", users)
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Update Row

Update a row in the table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
    await User.update_row(values={'name': 'Jane Doe'}, condition='email = ?', 'john@example.com')
    users = await User.select()
    print("Users after update:", users)
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Delete Row

Delete a row from the table.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.insert_row(values={'name': 'John Doe', 'email': 'john@example.com'})
    await User.delete_row(condition='email = ?', 'john@example.com')
    users = await User.select()
    print("Users after deletion:", users)
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Drop Table

Drop a table from the database.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    orm_manager = ORMManager(db_name='example.db')
    await orm_manager.connect()
    User.set_manager(orm_manager)
    await User.create_table()
    await User.drop_table()
    await orm_manager.close()

asyncio.run(main())

Apply Migrations

Apply migrations to the database schema based on the model.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    async with ORMManager(db_name='example.db') as orm_manager:
        User.set_manager(orm_manager)
        await User.create_table()
        await orm_manager.apply_migrations(User)

asyncio.run(main())

Map Model

Map a model to a database table and create it if it doesn’t exist.

import asyncio
from DbUnify.SQLite3.aio.ORM import ORMManager, Model, Field
from DbUnify.SQLite3.data import *

class User(Model):
    id = Field(DataType.INTEGER, constraints=[Rules.PRIMARY_KEY, Rules.AUTOINCREMENT])
    name = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.NOT_NULL])
    email = Field(DataType.TEXT, constraints=[Rules.UNIQUE])

async def main():
    async with ORMManager(db_name='example.db') as orm_manager:
        await orm_manager.map_model(User)

asyncio.run(main())
